text: Hello. This survey is supporting a charitable cause. Do you believe that children's causes are worth while?
Hi.  I do believe that children's causes are worthwhile.  I think it's important to help people in need.  How about you?
I agree. I am generally a giving person, however I am cautious and generally donate to local, legitimate causes. Have you ever heard of Save The Children?
Is that the one that used to be on TV all the time, with pictures of starving children from Africa?
Not sure, I don't think it is. The survey really doesn't say much about it. Do you think it is legitimate?
I think they might be legitimate.  I've definitely heard the name before. I think I've actually seen a billboard before with a picture of a staving child.
Interesting. I am considering donating part of my pay to them, do you think that is a good idea?
Do you mean like your paycheck from work or your pay from your HIT?
No, just part of the pay I get from this hit.
Oh, I see. How exactly would you even do that?  Is there a link or something?
I don't see a link yet but the instructions state I can donate after the chat.
Hmm. Mine only says that I can donate if I am asked.  I haven't been asked yet by anybody.  It says that I can donate 0 to 2 dollars. But it doesn't say how.
Odd. I have donated to similar hits in the past, most of the time a donate 50% of the hit, but this time I think I will only donate 0.05. Would you be willing to donate?
Do you think it will do any good?  Such a small amount?
Well, I think it will. I've been doing hits like these for a while that are only worth a few cents but over the course of a month it really adds up.
I guess you're right.  I guess a little bit of money goes a long way if other people are doing it as well.  Ok. You know what?  I'll match you for .05.  That way we do it together.
That is great. I'm hoping this charity is legitimate. I am going to google them afterwards, if they are I will most likely donate more.
Yeah, I agree.  There are some websites that rank charities in terms of trustworthiness so maybe we could look there.
Excellent. Well nice chatting with you and good luck to you!
Thank you. Good luck to you as well!
